name: Ridgeway Cover Manager
body:
## What is Ridgeway Cover Manager?
Ridgeway Cover Manager allows staff members at The Ridgeway School to easily and efficiently request lesson cover and room changes â€“ these requests are passed to the appropriate Head of Faculty for approval, before being sent to Cover Management Staff for logging onto the SIMS system.

![](http://georgedunk.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/2015-01-17-16_36_17-Greenshot-Copy.png)

## Current Build:
Alpha 0.6.3.1

### Download Here

_Disclaimer: This application will only run when connected to the school server._
